item.description:
Obviously the best way to wrap up your week......Drink Beer!

Sunset Grill & Tap has a great selection of beers on tap (112) bottles (300) and microbrews (380). They have beer clubs and beer tours too. Chances are, you'll find a beer you've never tried. Their food menu is crazy loaded too.

So I figure we'll meet up a little earlier in the evening so we're all in good shape for work the next day.
I'll be there at 5.

This should be a great opportunity for all of us to get to know each other and DRINK BEER. So let me know by Sun afternoon and I'll make sure we make space for everyone!

Here's the info on the location:

Sunset Grill & Tap Website

Hope to see you guys there!!
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP and we'll figure it out & cell (5133075955)
item.name: Sunday Funday @ Sunset Grill & Tap
